channel.title: Idea!
channel.description:
Make a fourm or what ever its called for spamming...They have it on sythe and fagex, i think they had it on kaint, so why not...It may lead newbs tords 100 posts faster, but it may slow down the usless topics in the genral cadagory..
*Mopar this isnt spam, please dont ban me*

item.title: Idea!
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

[quote=“Xerxes, post:6, topic:13072”]No.

General discussion is supposed to be Off topic but mopar cries about everyhting unlike Kaitnieks. He wouldn’t care less, what happend to Pwnd who spammed all the time? Nothing, he got his rep rested a time or too, and a warning, nothing else happend if I am right.[/quote]You spam more than me now, so you can’t say Mopar is crying.

o u der xerxes leel o man u der?

Read full topic

item.title: Idea!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Cheesehunk:

We already had an Off-Topic section. It was deleted because people thought if they could SPAM there, they might as well SPAM everywhere.

yep, exactly why we wont be trying that ever again
